players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice, how could you be so sure? Did you investigate someone else? Maybe Bob is the real mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Diana was killed, so Charlie is the killer. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."
Bob: "Alice, as detective, your claim is trustworthy. Charlie is mafia. Vote him."
Bob: "Alice's investigation proves Charlie is mafia. Vote him."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Diana was killed, so Charlie is the killer. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob, you keep repeating the same line. Why are you so eager to convict Charlie? Maybe you are the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
